gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 106, Pelicans 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Pelicans, 106-95. Bam Adebayo led Miami with 24 points and seven rebounds while Jimmy Butler added 23 points, nine rebounds, and six assists. Zion Williamson led the Pelicans with 23 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists as Herbert Jones added 19 points and five rebounds. The Heat improve to 31-25 as the Pelicans move to 34-23 on the year.
